definition: the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)

sentences.english: May his children be wandering beggars; may they be driven from their ruined homes.
sentences.chinese: 愿他的儿女漂流讨饭，从他们荒凉之处出来求食。

sentences.english: The bleak moorland stretched on all sides as far as the eye could see.
sentences.chinese: 荒凉的旷野向四面伸展开去，一望无际。

sentences.english: The world looks bleak to those who are Overtired.
sentences.chinese: 过度疲累的人看到的世界是极度的萧索与荒凉。

sentences.english: Secular ruined, though I will look on coldly.
sentences.chinese: 世俗的荒凉，我却冷眼旁观。

sentences.english: The region is too wild to be inhabited.
sentences.chinese: 这个地区太荒凉了，不宜居住。

sentences.english: Thus saith the Lord GOD; When the whole earth rejoiceth, I will make thee desolate.
sentences.chinese: 主耶和华如此说，全地欢乐的时候，我必使你荒凉。

sentences.english: Sunbury was passed through, and they came again into the lonely road.
sentences.chinese: 桑伯雷过去了，他们重新驶上荒凉的大路。

sentences.english: “It’s pretty lonely here, ” says a woman named Li Li, the marketing manager of an elegant restaurant in Kangbashi’s mostly vacant Lido Hotel.
sentences.chinese: “这里真的很荒凉”，丽都酒店的销售经理丽丽说。

sentences.english: The Pacific is more desolate than other seas; its spaces seem more vast.
sentences.chinese: 太平洋看来比别的海洋更加荒凉，更加烟波浩渺。

sentences.english: Let his children be continually vagabonds, and beg: let them seek their bread also out of their desolate places.
sentences.chinese: 愿他的儿女漂流讨饭，从他们荒凉之处出来求食。

sentences.english: But the paths were mossy and slippery and wild grass was growing rank. It was a desolate scene.
sentences.chinese: 只是苍苔路滑，荒草成窠，一派荒凉景象。

sentences.english: Back in 1969, Lanyu was a rather desolate place.
sentences.chinese: 兰屿岛在当时是很荒凉的孤岛。

sentences.english: The man lives in a lonely village.
sentences.chinese: 那个男人住在一个荒凉的山村里。

sentences.english: She was the reason he’d drifted back to this land of desolation.
sentences.chinese: 就是为了她，豪厄尔才不知不觉回到这片荒凉的土地。

sentences.english: Thenardier noted the enormous size of the cudgel and the solitude of the spot.
sentences.chinese: 德纳第望着那根粗壮无比的棍棒和那一片荒凉的地方。

definition: left to return to unchecked growth/overgrown/grown wild
dark and uninhabited (idiom); remote and deserted/God-forsaken
no sign of human habitation (idiom); desolate
